      TransactionRequestBuilder setBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
      Specifies the image of the product that will be shown on the receipt a copy of the supplied bitmap will be made and rescaled to 197x197 so you should give a squared image.

        Parameters:
        amount - in cents - must be larger than 0
        currency - must be the currency of the current country
        Throws:

        public TransactionRequestBuilder setDescription(String description)
        Specifies the desctiption of the payment
        Parameters:
        description - Description of the future transaction
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

      • setBitmap

        public TransactionRequestBuilder setBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
        Specifies the image of the product that will be shown on the receipt a copy of the supplied bitmap will be made and rescaled to 197x197 so you should give a squared image. If the supplied image is not square it will be padded with transparent pixels as needed
        Parameters:
        bitmap - image of the product to be added tothe future transaction
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

      • setEmail

        public TransactionRequestBuilder setEmail(String email)
        Sets email address used to delivery receipts
        Parameters:
        email - email to which the message should be delivered
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods

        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods
